title: Nine Million Minutes
features: When the past collides with the present, everything changes.
Twenty-six years is long enough to be a wallflower. Armed with a new auburn hair color and a lime green Jeep that screams “look at me,” Kricket Taylor steps outside her shy comfort zone.

Jay Hunter has a successful career as a speaker, capturing audiences by rolling up his sleeve and baring a jagged scar that signifies the biggest mistake of his life…making a promise he couldn’t keep.

With a coast-to-coast supply of willing and beautiful conference attendees, he has no desire for a relationship, but an encounter with a shy, awkward redhead triggers something deep. And when he finds out who she really is, the only way to make up for his long ago broken promise is to protect her from himself.
Nine Million Minutes, a humorous, yet touching contemporary romance novel, will resonate with anyone who has picked themselves up, brushed off the dirt, and stumbled towards a new beginning.

After five years, a secondary character's story begged to be told, resulting in her second novel, A Million to One.", 'In her "day job," she writes money management web content and enlightens audiences as a public speaker. Her true passion is encouraging people to gradually step outside their comfort zone to a richer, brighter world. Her romance novel, Nine Million Minutes, along with the So Awkward Journal, a step-by-step journal to aid in overcoming shyness, were the first steps in her steady march down passion\'s path.', "She enjoys curling up with a good romance novel on a rainy day, with coffee and her Westie pups by her side. And when the sun peeks out, you'll find her smacking a little white ball down the fairway, or cruising topless in her tricked out neon green Jeep. (The Jeep's topless, not her!)", 'She lives in Edmond, Oklahoma with her husband and two West Highland White "Terrors," Nic and Nellie.', 'Website: leighannlane.com', 'Facebook: Leigh Ann Lane; The Jeep Mafia Koozie Nation', 'Twitter: Kricketjeeper; The Jeep Mafia; SoAwkwardJournl', 'Instagram: Kricketjeeper_ ; The Jeep Mafia ; NicandNellie']}
